description:
Squid Girl gets her own private pool, Goro’s mother stops by the beach, and Squid Girl wants to send a message in a bottle and gets help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Is That an Inkflatable Pool? / Squidn`t Your Mom Stop By? / Is That a Message Ink a Bottle?
Vinyl Pool ja Naika? / Kaa-chan ja Naika? / Message Bottle ja Naika?
ビニールプールじゃなイカ? / 母ちゃんじゃなイカ? / メッセージボトルじゃなイカ?
